thread.title: Family of woman gunned down in Penang claims her body - Nation | The Star Online
thread.title_full: Family of woman gunned down in Penang claims her body - Nation | The Star Online

author: Christopher Tan
title: Family of woman gunned down in Penang claims her body - Nation | The Star Online
text:
Wednesday, 22 February 2017 | MYT 1:37 PM Family of woman gunned down in Penang claims her body by christopher tan Police carrying out investigations at the scene in Taman Pekaka on Monday 
GEORGE TOWN: Family members of businesswoman Ruby Lee Poh Ai claimed her body at the Penang Hospital mortuary on Wednesday. 
Lee, 49, was gunned down hitman-style at around 5.45pm Tuesday, some five minutes after she left her freight forwarding company in Lebuh Pekaka 1. 
A group of reporters who arrived at 9am were not allowed to enter the mortuary premises. 
Family members and friends of Lee were seen arriving at about 11.15am. 
They walked straight into the mortuary, ignoring questions from the reporters. 
Lee's husband Siak Kum Guan, 51, was not seen at the mortuary. 
Lee was shot several times in the chest and body by a pillion rider who fired at least 10 shots at her car.
